title: Charles Drury hints he's already over Katie Price as she 'dumps him for Kris Boyson'

It looks like Katie Price 's ex Charles Drury is moving on from her already.

The builder, who Katie initially dumped her ex fiance Kris for, has uploaded a cryptic Instagram post hinting that he is moving on from her.

Katie has reportedly now gone back to ex Kris, after she was spotted sneaking out of his house after staying the night.

But Charles appears to be focusing on other things as he gets over the failed romance.

(Image: Instagram)

He uploaded a photo to his story of a boxing ring, with the mysterious caption "big things coming" alongside an emoji with zipped lips.

What could Charles be training for? A movie role? A celeb boxing match? A showdown with Kris?

It's reported Katie is begging for Charles back after her indiscretion with Kris.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

According to The Sun , the mum-of-five has been bombarding Charles with calls and text messages, claiming she still wants to date him.

But friends say he's not interested.

A source said: "Katie was straight on the phone when she realised she’d been caught coming out of Kris' house.

(Image: Instagram)

"She was trying to convince him that she was only picking something up from Kris, but Charles has suspected for a while that she’d been seeing Kris behind his back so he didn't believe her.

"Katie was begging him to meet up with her and saying she wants to be with him, not Kris, but he's fed up with her lies and doesn't want to be mugged off."
